book.author: Gambardella, Matthew
book.title: XML Developer's Guide
book.description: An in-depth look at creating applications with XML.

book.author: Ralls, Kim
book.title: Midnight Rain
book.description: A former architect battles corporate zombies, an evil sorceress, and her own childhood to become queen of the world.

book.author: Corets, Eva
book.title: Oberon's Legacy
book.description: In post-apocalypse England, the mysterious agent known only as Oberon helps to create a new life for the inhabitants of London. Sequel to Maeve Ascendant.

book.author: Corets, Eva
book.title: The Sundered Grail
book.description: The two daughters of Maeve, half-sisters, battle one another for control of England. Sequel to Oberon's Legacy.

book.author: Randall, Cynthia
book.title: Lover Birds
book.description: When Carla meets Paul at an ornithology conference, tempers fly as feathers get ruffled.When Carla meets Paul at an ornithology conference, tempers fly as feathers get ruffled.When Carla meets Paul at an ornithology conference, tempers fly as feathers get ruffled.When Carla meets Paul at an ornithology conference, tempers fly as feathers get ruffled.

book.author: Thurman, Paula
book.title: Splish Splash
book.description: A deep sea diver finds true love twenty thousand leagues beneath the sea.

book.author: Knorr, Stefan
book.title: Creepy Crawlies
book.description: An anthology of horror stories about roaches, centipedes, scorpions and other insects.An anthology of horror stories about roaches, centipedes, scorpions and other insects.all

book.title: Paradox Lost
book.description: After an inadvertant trip through a Heisenberg Uncertainty Device, James Salway discovers the problems of being quantum.After an inadvertant trip through a Heisenberg Uncertainty Device, James Salway discovers the problems of being quantum.sss

book.title: Microsoft .NET: The Programming Bible
book.description: Microsoft's .NET initiative is explored in detail in this deep programmer's reference.Microsoft's .NET initiative is explored in detail in this deep programmer's reference.

book.title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer’s Stone
book.author: J. K. Rowling
book.description: Harry Potter has no idea how famous he is. That's because he's being raised by his miserable aunt and uncle who are terrified Harry will learn that he's really a wizard, just as his parents were. But everything changes when Harry is summoned to attend an infamous school for wizards, and he begins to discover some clues about his illustrious birthright. From the surprising way he is greeted by a lovable giant, to the unique curriculum and colorful faculty at his unusual school, Harry finds himself drawn deep inside a mystical world he never knew existed and closer to his own noble destiny.Harry Potter has no idea how famous he is. book.title: House of Dragons
book.author: Jessica Cluess
book.description: Five royal houses will hear the call to compete in the Trial for the dragon throne.
